channel.title: Project Blessed [Hyperion]
channel.description:
[center]After releasing [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,516811.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,516811.0.html[/url], I Roll Deep and I, decided to go further with Hyperion, because it's way more stabler, and it has better code. This will not be a remake. We will just write content, till it's playable The cache will be a #377.
[size=12pt][b]Current features:[/b][/size]
[ul][li]NPC and Player dialogues.[/li] [li]NPC spawning.[/li] [li]Ground Item support(Picking up, and dropping)[/li] [li]Working music and sounds.[/li] [li]A dialogue handler.[/li] [li]Weapon animations.[/li] [li]Player design screen.[/li] [li]Running.[/li] [li]Added about 15 new outgoing packets.[/li] [li]Pickpocketing.[/li] [li]Forced NPC and player chat.[/li] [li]Forced walking with animation.[/li] [li]Teleporting.[/li][/ul]
[size=12pt][b]Working on:[/b][/size]
[ul][li]Reporting/Muting.[/li] [li]Friend List and Private Messaging.[/li] [li]Fixing bugs in the skills be developed.[/li][/ul]
NPC spawning and working dialogues. [img]http://img268.imageshack.us/img268/3636/blessed1.png[/img]
Player design screen working. [img]http://img94.imageshack.us/img94/52/blessed2.png[/img]
Deposit box. [img]http://img822.imageshack.us/img822/4091/depositbox.png[/img]
Pickpocketing. [img]http://img7.imageshack.us/img7/700/pickpocketing.png[/img]
Forced NPC chat. [img]http://img683.imageshack.us/img683/52/blessed2.png[/img]
[b]Developers:[/b]
[ul][li]Native^ (Simon)[/li] [li]I Roll Deep (Diego)[/li][/ul] [/center]

item.title: Project Blessed [Hyperion]
item.dc:creator: @judostar1 judostar1
item.description:
@judostar1 wrote:

[quote=“I Roll Deep, post:46, topic:414933”][quote author=judostar1 link=topic=516894.msg3755764#msg3755764 date=1316441381]

Question what have you done?

Did you do the login your self? Most likely not (http://tinyurl.com/65tvpfc).

Everything else is extremely easy, won’t even comment on that lol.

Well shouldn’t say everything else, as even login is simple.

Still? You think We should change base? Start a DSPK maybe?

^^^^ dspk is crap, I take that as sarcasm :3
[/quote]
Ofcourse it was sarcasm lmfao[/quote]

xD

Read full topic

item.title: Project Blessed [Hyperion]
item.dc:creator: @I_Roll_Deep I Roll Deep
item.description:
@I_Roll_Deep wrote:

[quote=“The Wanderer, post:36, topic:414933”][quote author=I Roll Deep link=topic=516894.msg3754318#msg3754318 date=1316304151]
This is a fun project, doesn’t have really some goals, so yeah, it can be finished when ever.
[/quote]
Which is why I said it probably won’t go anywhere. You’ll get bored within 2 weeks and release it with no great progress done. Not hating, just it seems that is your personality. Nevertheless, I wish you luck, as anything being developed in Hyperion is better than 100 servers being developed in PI or Delta.[/quote]
It doesn’t have to mean that we are going to quit it. We just want to do something that will be help the community, so we can contribute it.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Blessed [Hyperion]
item.dc:creator: @I_Roll_Deep I Roll Deep
item.description:
@I_Roll_Deep wrote:

[quote=“Native^, post:34, topic:414933”][quote author=The Wanderer link=topic=516894.msg3753958#msg3753958 date=1316282510]

I really don’t see this going anywhere, as I Roll Deep has 4 threads on the front page of the Server Development section with him in it as a developer. 3 threads are started by him. I just think he doesn’t have… dedication?

With the amount of updates i see it going somehwere pretty fast…

Come back in two weeks.
[/quote]
Well, this is not a remake, that means we don’t really have a goal, so we can say it’s finished whenever we want. :P[/quote]
This is a fun project, doesn’t have really some goals, so yeah, it can be finished when ever.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Blessed [Hyperion]
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“Native^, post:32, topic:414933”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=516894.msg3753952#msg3753952 date=1316282113]

You got working doors?
And I’ve almost got a successful teleportation system, if you have trouble.

We have not started on a door system yet. And our teleportation system works fine.

I’m getting a small problem with mine, how is yours set up?
[/quote]
With an enum wich hold the data(location, runes, etc.), but it’s not finished yet, it still has this bug, that you can mass click, and get xp etc. While you are being teleported.

Edit: And we need the ancient teleport animation. Anyone got it?[/quote]

Yea I’m having problem with the enum, which it keeps telling me is to be expected. Would be better if I knew what that was.

Read full topic
